title: ISic000015. Honours for Caracalla
body:
Facsimile Images

M(arco) ((·)) Aurelio
Antonino ((·)) Caes(ari)
Imp(eratoris) ((·)) L(uci) ((·)) Septimi ((·)) Se-
veri ((·)) Pii ((·)) Arabici ((·)) Adi-
5abenici ((·)) p(atris) ((·)) p(atriae) ((·)) Aug(usti) ((·)) filio
res ((·)) p(ublica) ((·)) Panhor(mitanorum) ((·)) d(ecreto) ((·)) d(ecurionum)

Apparatus criticus

Text of ILMusPalermo

English translation

To Marcus Aurelius Antoninus (i.e. Caracalla), son of Emperor Lucius Septimius Severus Pius, victor in Arabia and Adiabene, Father of Fatherland, Augustus. The citizens of Panhormus (erected this) by the decree of the city council.

commentary
